mapper.sql: id , source, content, leading_official, leading_department, deadline, created_at, progress, issues_and_challenges, requires_coordination, approval_status, status, is_urgent
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (source, content, leading_official, leading_department, deadline, created_at, progress, issues_and_challenges, requires_coordination, approval_status, status, is_urgent) VALUES (#{source}, #{content}, #{leadingOfficial}, #{leadingDepartment}, #{deadline}, #{createdAt}, #{progress}, #{issuesAndChallenges}, #{requiresCoordination}, #{approvalStatus}, #{status}, #{isUrgent})
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET progress = #{progress}, issues_and_challenges = #{issuesAndChallenges}, requires_coordination = #{requiresCoordination}, approval_status = #{approvalStatus}, status = #{status}, is_urgent = #{isUrgent}, next_steps = #{nextSteps}, handler = #{handler}, phone = #{phone} WHERE id = #{id}
